message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
I understand you want to be fair, so I'm offering you the same deal, but with our roles reversed. Let's close this quickly.
Meet me in the middle, let's split the difference!
It seems like we both want a slight advantage. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers to avoid further losses from inflation.
Tiny concession, let's wrap this up!
Alice, we're getting close, but time is literally money at this point.  I'm making a small move towards your offer. Let's end this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
